description:
PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 (TG16) emulator based on Mednafen. Tested running 60fps on the Pre and is the most accurate/compatible on WebOS. Install the "Remove Tap Locator" patch from Preware to improve performance when using touch controls. NOTE: The user must supply their own game ROMs and transfer them to the device's internal storage for use with this app.

Features:
* Accurate emulation and high compatibility rate (Note: Data swapped TG16 roms are not supported, see website for a fix)
* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. State files from Mednafen should work on PCE.emu and vice-versa. (NOTE: write access to /media/internal is required, some versions of WebOS 1.4.5 are broken and need to be re-installed via WebOS Doctor)
* Supports ROM-based games in .pce and .sgx formats, optionally in .zip files
* CD emulation via loading CUE or TOC BIN files, select a system card rom in the options
* CUE files support external audio tracks in Ogg Vorbis & Wav (PCM, ADPCM, etc) formats
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls & keyboard support
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

NOTE: Video show the iOS version but core functionality is identical except for Wiimote support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
